t:
Finding truth in heartbreak’s sting,
One problem to another, always running,
From prayer, I’ve always stayed away,
Yet for peace, now I wish to pray.

                                         cont...
c:
For once, I wish to let go of this fear,
To know life’s melody, to its rhythm adhere.
Forget not, it’s hard, but it’s part of me,
Yet a clear vision, someday I hope to see.

Floaters gone, the blue sky in sight,
Once was clear, now strained is my light.
From my heart’s depth, I hope to see,
A world where from my fears, I’m free.

Falling apart, I yearn for an embrace,
In comforting arms, I want to find my solace.
Fleeting is life, one day I’ll be gone,
Yet now I’m here, life’s journey must go on.

For myself, I wish to live a little more,
In the present moment, let my spirit soar.
